short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: elegantly edit the url of the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
a live, interactive tool for editing urls and their parameters; automatically updates the url preview to match your input, and allows removing and adding url parameters, including query strings in the hash (#...) portion of the url

click the ↻ to update the url and refresh the page and the ✂ to copy the new url to your clipboard
